import ForYouPage from'./ForYouPage';import MostLikedPage from'./MostLikedPage';import Top5Page from'./Top5Page';import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef}from'react';import'../style/ExplorePage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ExplorePage=()=>{const[activeTab,setActiveTab]=useState('For You');// Render content based on active tab
const renderContent=()=>{switch(activeTab){case'For You':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ForYouPage,{});case'Most Liked':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MostLikedPage,{});case'Top 5':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Top5Page,{});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ForYouPage,{});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"explore-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"explore-title",children:"Explore Cafes and Restaurants"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tab-navigation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tabs-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`${activeTab==='For You'?'active-tab':'not-active-tab'}`,onClick:()=>setActiveTab('For You'),children:"For You"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`${activeTab==='Most Liked'?'active-tab':'not-active-tab'}`,onClick:()=>setActiveTab('Most Liked'),children:"Most Liked"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`${activeTab==='Top 5'?'active-tab':'not-active-tab'}`,onClick:()=>setActiveTab('Top 5'),children:"Top 5"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tab-content",children:renderContent()})]});};export default ExplorePage;
